Christs teares over Jerusalem. Or, A caveat for England, to call to God for mercy, lest we be plagued for our contempt and wickednesse To the tune of The merchants. Christs teares over Jerusalem.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
For Henry Gosson, living upon London Bridge, Printed at London : [ca. 1640]
Publication date suggested by STC. In two parts. Verse - "When Christ our Lord drew nigh". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
